programme.title: TAIWAN PROFESSIONAL BASKETBALL LEAGUE
programme.desc: The Taiwan Professional Basketball League TPBL is Taiwans premier professional basketball league, bringing elite players, passionate fans, and worldclass entertainment to create an electrifying basketball experience. Featuring seven dynamic teamsTaipei Mars, New Taipei Kings, New Taipei CTBC DEA, Taoyuan Taiwan Beer Leopards, Hsinchu Toplus Lioneers, Formosa Dreamers, and Kaohsiung AquasTPBL showcases highintensity competition and unforgettable moments on the court. With a commitment to excellence, innovation, and fan engagement, TPBL is shaping the future of professional basketball in Asia and inspiring the next generation of athletes.

programme.title: The Circuit
programme.desc: Ryan. Kaji. Ryan Kaji is the king of toy videos, and one of YouTubes highest paid social media stars. Emily Chang meets Ryan and his parents in Los Angeles at the set of his new movie.

programme.title: The Circuit
programme.desc: How Youtube Became Must Watch TV. Emily Chang speaks with YouTube CEO Neal Mohan about the creator economy, staying atop the AI wave and transforming the platform into the worlds biggest streamer.

programme.title: The Deal with Alex Rodriguez and Jason Kelly
programme.desc: Ted Leonsis. Alex and Jason talk with Ted Leonsis, the founder of Monumental Sports & Entertainment, about how winning sports teams can help turn Washington into a super city.

programme.title: Bloomberg Wall Street Week
programme.desc: A weekly program telling the stories of capitalism from around the world, hosted by David Westin in New York.

programme.title: Bloomberg Primer
programme.desc: Scientists and entrepreneurs are testing radical ideas like solar radiation management and ocean fertilisation and finding funding for it.

programme.title: We Baby Bears
programme.desc: The Bears find a mysterious crayon that has the power to make anything they draw become REAL.

programme.title: We Bare Bears
programme.desc: When Grizz comes home with a live crab, he thinks it can become a pet for the brothers to share. However, after the crab pinches Ice Bears ear and wont let go, Panda and Grizz have to get their injured brother to the hospital, and fast!

programme.title: Jellystone!
programme.desc: Shag hires a bunch of detectives to find his lost sense of childhood wonder.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: Its St. Patricks Day and after wishing to become a leprechaun, Beast Boy becomes obsessed with gold.

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings World Tour
programme.desc: Grizzy has adopted a lamb and wants to educate him properly. The Lemmings want to play leapfrog with him!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs chase Lamput backstage of a magic show but get tripped up by the contraptions there. They end up on stage as the Magician is about to perform his deathdefying tricks.

programme.title: Clarence
programme.desc: Clarence is so troubled by the sight of his teacher in a social setting outside of school, he cant stop himself from intruding on her doomed blind date.

programme.title: Mechamato
programme.desc: Amato and Pian plan to go into the Mechanizer to see the new town the Cone Konchos have built, but things go wrong when Bula and Bili accidentally join them.

programme.title: Steven Universe The Movie
programme.desc: After so many harrowing adventures, Steven and the Gems are ready to celebrate how far theyve come with a movie musical! Little do they know theyre about to face their worst enemy yet.

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings World Tour
programme.desc: There is only one carrot left in the house but Grizzy and the Lemmings all need it for different reasons.

programme.title: Jellystone!
programme.desc: Huck creates a fake opponent to run against him in the mayoral election.

programme.title: We Bare Bears
programme.desc: When Nom Nom shows up on the Bears doorstep, dishevelled and deposed from his spot as cutest internet star ever after a recent meltdown, he enlists the Bears to help him regain his title.

programme.title: Mr Bean The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean builds an alarm clock to wake him up in time for a comet flyby

programme.title: Tiny Toons Looniversity
programme.desc: Buster finds a cloning machine at Wile E. Coyotes yard sale that he uses to make another Buster and Babs and Sweetie snag a time machine that they use to open a vintage clothing store.

programme.title: Ninjago Dragons Rising
programme.desc: All roads lead the illprepared Ninja to confront Ras as he enacts the Blood Moon Ritual and threatens to destroy the merged lands.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Redbird learns a lesson when he takes one of Buffs stuffed animals without asking. When the stuffed animal accidentally gets swiped by the Legion of Zoom, Redbird will have to rescue the stuffed unicorn or admit to Buff what he did.

programme.title: Builder Brothers Dream Factory
programme.desc: When their young neighbour CeCe comes over to visit, Drew and Jonathan share the story of how the Dream Factory came to be.

programme.title: Mumfie
programme.desc: When all the islanders are gathered for a celebration, Pinkey gives Mumfie a very strange hat. Mumfie is too embarrassed to put it on and tries to forget it until he realizes that, out of friendship, he ought to wear the bizarre headgear.

programme.title: Jessicas Big Little World
programme.desc: Jessica is determined to stop sucking her thumb, but kicking the habit is a lot harder than she realized.

programme.title: Tangranimals
programme.desc: Russ has put his picnic down on a little sea bubble. But when it gets whisked away by an ocean current, theres no getting it back! Our friends are going to have to work out where that current is headed!

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: Jon learns that shortcuts arent always shorter when the Ranchers get lost in the badlands with the hungry Thunderfoot on their trail.

programme.title: Lucas The Spider
programme.desc: Lucas questions his spiderhood when he cant spin a web properly.

programme.title: The Singing Thief
programme.desc: A master jewel thief turns over a new leaf as a professional singer in a nightclub. However, a series of robberies happened shortly after and he becomes the suspect again. The thief then sets up a trap to snare the copycat but will this backfire on him?

programme.title: The Pure and the Evil
programme.desc: Two teen girls, Rose and May, become close friends despite their different social backgrounds. The rich girl May moves to America but returns years later to see Rose, now a beauty queen and bar girl. Rose is immediately attracted to Fangs fianc and their relationship quickly deteriorates when Rose sets out to pursue him

programme.title: Magnificent Wanderers
programme.desc: Lin and his two friends are traveling patriots who vow to stand up against violence and fight for justice. They meet a rich young man Chu by chance one day and the four become best friends. When a foreign prince plots to possess Chus family fortune and goes after him, Lin and friends go all out to help Chu fight against the villain.

Whys this happening?

programme.title: 2018 Drama Special
programme.desc:
Forget the existing oneact dramas! Short but impactive! KBS Drama Special presents high quality single episode dramas.
Dramas are the broadcast content with the widest public appeal.
KBS Drama Special will produce short dramas of farreaching impact involving at times a serious social message, unique emotions or perspectives. It will stay abreast of modern viewership.

programme.title: Rooted 1
programme.desc: Across rippled dunes, in the windswept grasslands of the southern Kalahari towers a magnificent Camelthorn. It has stood here for two centuries. This tree is never lonely, learn how it provides food, shelter and a hunting ground to many creatures.

programme.title: Rooted 1
programme.desc: Discover the story of the much loved Sausage Tree, whose nectar filled blooms and sausage shaped fruits entice animals of all kinds, from insects to elephants. See how the very animals who rely on this generous tree ensure its proliferation.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Wally the Walrus searches all over Adventure Bay for Capn Turbot and turns the town upsidedown in the process. Everybody loves Helga Humdingers Hummy Gummy treats, causing Mayor Humdinger to get jealous and steal them all.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Rubble & Wild rescue animals from a giant runaway ball of yarn. Skye and Rory rescue a painter hanging from a scaffold. Marshall & Leo rescue animals stuck on a Ferris Wheel. Everest and Shade rescue a baby mountain goat stuck in a crevasse.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Its a double daring mid air rescue as Mayor Goodways first flying lesson goes sideways, the Pups make sure everyone lands safely.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew
programme.desc: Mix and Motors favorite TV star has a new movie playing in Builder Cove, if the pups can build place to watch it! When Grandpa tells the pups about a secret buried treasure, they find out the key to finding this treasure is construction teamwork!

programme.title: Rubble & Crew
programme.desc: A new farmer in town asks Rubble & Crew to build a barn for her pig! But will it be done in time for the big Pig Party? Motors super special birthday present gets delayed when the pups realize Builder Coves airport needs a bigger runway.

programme.title: DORA
programme.desc: Dora and Boots help Swiper rejoin with his duplicates and make it to Grandmas picnic. Dora and Boots help Bateo the Bat get to the baseball game in time to play.

programme.title: Baby Sharks Big Show!
programme.desc: The Tentacools get caught up in the trappings of being rock starfishes and forget that they formed the band to have fun. When Hank discovers his friends are going easy on him during dodge bubble, he sets out to become a tough fishy like Shadow.

programme.title: Sharkdog
programme.desc: Max is ready to go on his fun camping trip when Sharkdog comes down with a mysterious illness.

programme.title: Sharkdog
programme.desc: A terrible storm spooks Sharkdog and he gets loose, threatening to ruin Moms TV interview.

programme.title: Sharkdog
programme.desc: Max tries to find something that Sharkdog will eat that isnt fish.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppas car runs out of petrol but thankfully Granddad Dogs garage isnt far away. With one phone call, Granddad Dog is on his way. He tows Peppas car back to his garage.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa wins the top prize in a raffle at school a trip in a hot air balloon. Mummy Pig, Daddy Pig, George and Peppa climb aboard and enjoy the flight until the balloon gets caught in a tree. Luckily, the balloon has landed in a very familiar garden.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and George love jumping in puddles, even when its raining but when George takes off his rain hat, he catches a cold. After a while George is feeling much better. Now hes more than happy to wear his rain hat, even when its not raining.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Pedro Pony wears glasses. Peppa thinks she might need glasses too, so Mummy Pig takes her to the optician. Peppa is a little disappointed to discover that she has perfect vision but that doesnt stop her wearing some rather fabulous sunglasses.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show
programme.desc: Tiny Chef hosts movie night for friends and turns his tree stump into a popcorn machine to pop enough for everyone! Tiny Chef makes banana toast but after squishing his perfect banana, has to create a brand new dish!

programme.title: The Thundermans Undercover
programme.desc: After a training accident causes a glitch in Chloes powers, Max and Phoebe look for a cure. After Max thinks hes solved the issue, he allows Chloe to attend a party with friends, but his treatment creates brand new powers Chloe cant control.

programme.title: The Really Loud House
programme.desc: Its parent teacher conference night and the Loud parents find themselves endlessly running around from class to class. Lincoln has his heart set on the Banana Split that their parents have promised if the Loud kids get more good reviews than bad.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: On Halloween, Smurfette gives Wimpy a magic pumpkin to help him scare the other Smurfs. When Azrael gets injured in the forest, Wild brings the cat to the Smurfs village to heal

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Sandy gives her friends special saltwater trees, but they need more attention than she expected. SpongeBob and Patrick mistake a burglar for the tooth fairy.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: When SpongeBobs parents come to visit, their thirst for thrills comes as a big surprise. Youll learn all you need to get your boating license in this educational driving film.

programme.desc: When Carol Pingreys photo gets more likes on social media than Loris she tries to oneup her. Lola is being temporarily homeschooled. Thinking it looks like fun, the other kids try to get in on it.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Lori and Lincoln visit the city. Lori struggles to be a city girl and Lincoln finds Ronnie Anne has changed. The family has a new plan to dodge Luans April Fools Day pranking stunt doubles
